title: [Merited Metalworks, Tools]
description: Woven blankets of warm-toned linen showcase a number of rattan baskets, the rectangular containers filled with various tools cushioned on strips of velvet.  Brass-chained censers gently scent the room with dried sage and blackberries, the tendrils of smoke falling slowly towards the mahogany rack set upon the wool-carpeted floor.  Set against the back wall are mosaic-framed canvases, the dimly lit display guarding several pieces of artwork behind a pane of smoked glass.
